Uses of Class
java.util.logging.Formatter

Packages that use Formatter
java.util.logging This package allows to add logging to any application. 
 

Uses of Formatter in java.util.logging
 

Subclasses of Formatter in java.util.logging
 class SimpleFormatter
          SimpleFormatter can be used to print a summary of the information contained in a LogRecord object in a human readable format.
 class XMLFormatter
          Formatter to convert a LogRecord into an XML string.
 

Methods in java.util.logging that return Formatter
 Formatter Handler.getFormatter()
          Gets the formatter used by this handler to format the logging messages.
 

Methods in java.util.logging with parameters of type Formatter
(package private)  void Handler.internalSetFormatter(Formatter newFormatter)
          Sets the formatter to be used by this handler.
 void Handler.setFormatter(Formatter newFormatter)
          Sets the formatter to be used by this handler.
 

Constructors in java.util.logging with parameters of type Formatter
StreamHandler(OutputStream os, Formatter formatter)
          Constructs a StreamHandler object with the supplied output stream and formatter.
